direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the state of the CompositeMap by adding or removing key-value pairs.
Both methods involve modifying the state of the composite maps, albeit in different ways (removal vs. clearing all entries).
Both methods interact with the composite maps array, though one adds a map and the other removes a key-value pair.
Both methods remove elements from the CompositeMap, though one removes a map and the other removes a key-value pair.
